minecraft:written_book_content.title: OCW RHC FAQ v2
minecraft:written_book_content.author: Nincodedo
pages: [{"text":"How do I get a free banner for mapping a specific location?\n\nUse the command `/trigger bannerplz`"}]

[{"text":"What kind of structures can I get free banners for?
Village: ","extra":[{"text":"Yellow","color":"yellow"}]},{"text":"
Ruined Portal: ","extra":[{"text":"Magenta","color":"light_purple"}]},{"text":"
Stronghold: ","extra":[{"text":"Green","color":"dark_green"}]},{"text":"
Spawner: ","extra":[{"text":"Orange","color":"#FFAA00"}]},{"text":"
Amethyst Geode: ","extra":[{"text":"Purple","color":"dark_purple"}]},{"text":"
Desert Pyramid: ","extra":[{"text":"Cyan","color":"aqua"}]},{"text":"
Woodland Mansion: ","extra":[{"text":"Brown","color":"#964B00"}]},{"text":"
OCW Structure: ","extra":[{"text":"Light Blue","color":"#00829F"}]}]

[{"text":"Special non-Vanilla Game Mechanics","underlined":true},{"text":"

Bone Meal on Sugar Cane","bold":true,"underlined":false},{"text":"
Players can use bone meal on sugar cane to make it grow. Dispensers filled with bone meal can also grow sugar cane.","underlined":false}]

[{"text":"Special non-Vanilla Game Mechanics","underlined":true},{"text":"

Poisonous Potatoes in Composter","bold":true,"underlined":false},{"text":"
Players can put poisonous potatoes into composters. Hoppers work too.","underlined":false}]

minecraft:written_book_content.title: OCW RHC FAQ: Special Edition
minecraft:written_book_content.author: Nincodedo
pages: [{"text":"How do I become successful in this game?\n\n"},{"text":"Don't die","bold":true}]
